item.title: Geo-Experimentation via Time Based Regression in PyMC
item.description: Introduction In this notebook I describe and present an implementation of the time based regression (TBR) approach to marketing campaign analysis in the context of geo experimentation presented in the paper Estimating Ad Effectiveness using Geo Experiments in a Time-Based Regression Framework by Jouni Kerman, Peng Wang and Jon Vaver (Google, Inc.Â 2017). I strongly recommend reading the paper as it is quite clear in the exposition of the approach and presents some simulation results.
